pages.name: Resonance of the Faceted Crystal
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.

Splits apart a well-grown Raw crystal cluster into seperal aspected crystal clusters. For more information, see $(l:demon_will/aspected_will)Aspected Will$(). $(br2)$(blank)Blank Runes: 4 $(br)$(water)Water Runes: 1 $(br)$(air)Air Runes: 1 $(br)$(fire)Fire Runes: 1 $(br)$(earth)Earth Runes: 1 $(br)$()Dusk Runes: 12 $(br2)$()Total Runes: 20
